testcase.brief: (IxPort: C=1) Verify Speed and Duplex configured on BASE-T ports if AutoNegotiation is enabled only on IxExplore;
testcase.description: IXIA AutoNegotiation:Yes, speed:auto/1000/100/10, duplex:auto/full/half; Switch speed:auto/1000/100/10, duplex:auto/1000/100/10

step.desc: Show interface mgt0 to get ip address
Get mgt0's ip address
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed auto' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex auto' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia 1000/full
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia 1000/full
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia 1000/full
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw 1000/full
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/100/full;after autonegotion, ixia 100/full
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw 100/full
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion,ixia 100/half
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/100/half; sw 100/half
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion,ixia 10/full
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/10/full; sw 10/full
mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, ixia 10/half
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw auto/auto, ixia enable/10/half; sw 10/half
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed 1000' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex full' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia 1000/full(1000M has no non-auto mode, so the result is the same as auto mode)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed auto -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, sw 1000/full(1000M has no non-auto mode, so the result is the same as auto mode)
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia 1000/full(1000M has no non-auto mode, so the result is the same as auto mode)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw 1000/full(1000M has no non-auto mode, so the result is the same as auto mode)
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw down 1000/full
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, sw down 1000/full
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, sw down 1000/full
mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/10/half; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 1000/full, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, sw down 1000/full
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed 100' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex full' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia up 100/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, sw up 100/full
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw down 100/full(speed is not the same)

mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half, but the configure only support full, shutdown the link)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw down 100/full
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, ixia up 100/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, sw up 100/full
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, sw down 100/full
mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/10/half; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/full, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, sw down 100/full
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed 100' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex half' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia up 100/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, sw up 100/half
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw down 100/half(speed is not the same)

mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half, but the configure only support full, shutdown the link)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw down 100/half
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, ixia up 100/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, sw up 100/half
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, sw down 100/half
mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/10/half; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 100/half, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, sw down 100/half
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed 10' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex full' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia up 10/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, sw up 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw down 10/full(speed is not the same)
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, ixia down 100/half(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full

mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half, but the configure only support full, shutdown the link)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/10/half; after autonegotion, ixia up 10/half (ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/full, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, sw up 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;
step.ssh: -v 'no interface ${sw1.port1} shutdown' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} speed 10' -v 'interface ${sw1.port1} duplex half' -v 'show running-config'

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, ixia up 10/half(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/auto/auto;after autonegotion, sw up 10/half
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 1000 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn true" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/1000/full;after autonegotion, sw down 10/full(speed is not the same)
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn true -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/100/full; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, ixia down 100/half(speed is not the same)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 100 -10fullIn false -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn true -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/100/half; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full

mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, ixia down N/A/N/A(ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half, but the configure only support full, shutdown the link)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode full -speed 10 -10fullIn true -10halfIn false -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/10/full; after autonegotion, sw down 10/full
mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/10/half; after autonegotion, ixia up 10/half (ixia not get the auto-nego frames from sw, should set duplex to half)
step.ssh: -v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.phytype}" -v "ah_port_config -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -phyMode copper -autonegotiate true -duplexMode half -speed 10 -10fullIn false -10halfIn true -100fullIn false -100halfIn false -1000fullIn false" -v "after 3000" -v "port_status_get -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v ""

step.desc: mode:copper, sw 10/half, ixia enable/10/half;after autonegotion, sw up 10/half
